title: Banned for getting called a N*gger
body: I get called a N*gger.. tell that person they're stupid... and I get banned? Riot is a joke... link the whole chat log. Someone expresses racism towards me and I get banned for not being frindly? Okay? #Riotsupportsracism2017

replies.body:
Racism is not appropriate for the game, and reports are your best bet towards helping us tackle that kind of behavior.  When confronted with harassment like that, you'll want to mute and keep your focus on the game.  

In this case, I wasn't able to find another player using slurs towards you, even then it's not okay to repeat it.  **Anyone **contributing towards negative experiences would be reviewed, though.  Looking at your logs it seems you were broadcasting drama into all chat when muting would have been the best option.  Your account has also had a history of homophobic slurs and **extreme **language towards others, so you were already at the top of the [escalation path](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-).  Meaning, anything even minor would have resulted in a permanent suspension.  

I invite you to reach out to our PB team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like to dispute this.

Since we don't know your chat logs, we can't point out what could have been marked as offensive. No, they do not support racism, and people who are racist often receive swift punishment. If you were banned for your behavior, it's either likely due to severely extreme offensive chat behavior, or cumulatively negative chat behavior with prior punishments already taken place.
